SELECT ORDERS.ORDER_PRDNAME, COUNT(*) as count, PRODUCT.PRD_NUM, PRODUCT.PRD_NAME, PRODUCT.PRD_IMAGE, PRODUCT.PRD_PRICE FROM ORDERS LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERS.ORDER_PRDNAME = PRODUCT.PRD_NAME GROUP BY ORDER_PRDNAME HAVING COUNT(ORDER_PRDNAME) > 1 ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
